thread.title: UK confident of agreeing solution on post-Brexit customs - PM's spokesman

title: UK confident of agreeing solution on post-Brexit customs - PM's spokesman
text:
May 3, 2018 / 10:44 AM / Updated 8 hours ago UK confident of agreeing solution on post-Brexit customs - PM's spokesman Reuters Staff 1 Min Read
LONDON (Reuters) - Britain is confident it can agree a solution on post-Brexit customs arrangements which works for both sides of the negotiations with the European Union, Prime Minister Theresa May’s spokesman said on Thursday.
“Both of the options that we have put forward are serious propositions ... we are taking time to get them right. We are absolutely confident we can agree a solution that works for all the parties involved,” he told reporters, adding that the two proposals were being “refined”. Reporting by Elizabeth Piper, editing by William James
